title: Being Serviced
description: Content Warning: This is not a romance story. This book contains numerous graphical descriptions of sexual activities, focused around sex between black men and white women. Intended for mature readers. ================================Trisha was a Black Cock Whore and proud of it. Her husband Mike agreed. And she had to have as much BBC as he could find for her.This is the story about the night when she found everything she desired, and MORE. She found everything that she needed.The story unfolds at a Black Men on White Women Hotel Floor Takeover Party.
author: I.M. Telling
